column1: * 1917 – J.R.R. Tolkien attends a medical board examination. He requires further indoor hospital treatment. His address is given as 9th Royal Defence Corps
* 1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Fay Darrington (16 November 1971).
* 1997 - The Brazilian Tolkien Society is founded.
* 2011 - The Lord of the Rings: War in the North is released in Australia and New Zealand.

column3: travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmos message to Turgon.
